summary: HR ACADEMY website project with admin/user navigation and public-launch guidance; currently dealing with deployment/preview version mismatch during release of Version 41.
known_issues: Live deployment unsuccessful: deployment error while releasing Version 41 to production.
Preview panel/editor may show an older version and not auto-refresh to the latest deployed build (version mismatch).

existing_features.title: Add a frontend build-info value (build version + build timestamp) embedded at build time, and display it in the UI so users/admins can confirm whether the preview pane is showing the latest frontend bundle.

In the Admin dashboard, add a 'Diagnostics' section that fetches and displays the backend build info and highlights whether the backend build info matches the frontend build info (to help diagnose stale previews/caching).

Add a user-facing 'Refresh preview' action that helps the user force an update when the right-side preview is stale (e.g., a button that reloads the page and optionally clears browser caches where possible).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a backend build-info query endpoint that returns a small, human-readable build identifier (e.g., version string) and build timestamp so the frontend can verify which backend canister code is currently running.
